skill.name: setup-cloudbase-openclaw
skill.description: Configure Moltbot/OpenClaw for CloudBase full-stack development. Checks ~/.openclaw/ or ~/.clawdbot/ config, finds workspace directory, updates AGENTS.md, configures mcporter with CloudBase MCP, and copies app templates to workspace. Guides users to get environment ID and API keys.
